comment: A json-ld resume for Olve Drageset
label: Resume: Olve Drageset

basicInfo.name: Olve Drageset
basicInfo.label: Cognitive Scientist
basicInfo.summary: I am currently studying Artificial Intelligence on masters level, and my bachelor is in Cognitive Science with a large specialization of computer science subjects. I enjoy team work, programming, and data modeling, which are some of the areas which I excel in. I find the process of coming up with, discussing, developing, and implementing ideas with a group of skilled colleagues with different backgrounds and outlooks very rewarding. I have experience teaching basic web development to undergraduate students, and enjoy working with semantic technologies and ontology building. As a hobby I like to build 2D games in Unity.

workExperience.summary: As a teaching assistant I was responsible for planning and leading programming labs for the subject INFO134 Client Programming. In the labs I taught HTML5/CSS3, JavaScript and MongoDB, and helped students with practical assignments. I also provided the students with written feedback on practical assignments, and produced exercises, mini lectures and code examples.

In my time with the Heavy Combat Engineers I took on tasks in operating and maintaining a selection of encrypted radio communications systems, security tasks, and observation. Our team completed prolonged missions in small teams with and without NCO leadership. I also had the honor of being our platoon's elected representative (Troppstillitsvalgt).

Hoeg Café was a nonprofit café for students and visitors at my then current high school, UWC RCN. It was founded as a response to our old café closing down. My experience was diverse, from economy and HR to waitering and cooking.

courses: Research Project: Coevolution of maze solvers and mazes
education.description: A two year masters programme in AI, with a dash of Data Science

A single semester preparatory programme of bachelor level subjects selected to bridge the mathematical gap between my bachelor in Cognitive Science and the Master in Artificial Intelligence, and to give me time for self study of Calculus

education.area: Cognitive Science, Specialised in Information Science
courses: LOG111 Deduction, Model Theory and Meta Logic
INF100 Introduction to Object Oriented Programming
FIL105 Introduction to Philosophy of Mind
education.description: The UiB bachelor's programme in cognitive science with specialisation in information science borrows subjects from several faculties and is aimed at giving cognitive scientists the tools they need to work with AI and software development

institution.name: United World College Red Cross Nordic

courses: English A1 Language and Literature SL
education.description: UWC RCN is a diverse international boarding school with students from over 90 nations. The IB Diploma Programme is an internationally acknowledged standard for high school education
